name: FACEPALM
slogan: Crosscheck console logs with chat history to troubleshoot issues intelligently.
description: FACEPALM analyzes OpenClaw console logs and chat history from the last 5 minutes, then uses Codex 5.3 to diagnose and troubleshoot issues. Can be invoked when troubleshooting is needed (e.g. after Agent Swarm or manual trigger).
author: Austin
